entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
